SEARCH
Package org.bvsd

Class Image

java.lang.Object
org.bvsd.Image
public class Image extends Object
The Image class provides an easy-to-use interface for introductory Java students to explore image processing without having to learn the intricacies of the BufferedImage class. It depends on the related Pixel class. The goal is to allow students to focus on learning how to iterate through a 2D array and implement effects by performing mathematical operations on pixels.

    • Image

      public Image(String filename) throws IOException
      Constructor that creates an image from a file.
      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • Image

      public Image(int w, int h)
      Constructor that creates a blank grid of pixels given a width, height, and type. The default color of the image will be white.
      Parameters:
      w - The width of the image in pixels
      h - The height of the image in pixels

    • Image

      public Image(Pixel[][] pxls)
      Constructor that creates an image from an array of pixels.
      Parameters:
      pxls - The 2D array of pixels

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(String filename, Image.FORMAT format) throws IOException
      Writes the current pixel array to file.
      Parameters:
      filename - The path to outfile
      format - Whether to write in JPG or PNG
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an issue writing the file
